definition: toward the center or interior, relating to or existing in the mind or thoughts
details:
adverb
- toward the center or interior
= example: toward the center or interior
= synonyms: inwards
- to or toward the inside of
= synonyms: inwards, in
adjective
- relating to or existing in the mind or thoughts
= example: relating to or existing in the mind or thoughts
- directed or moving inward or toward a center
= synonyms: inbound
